author: Nathan Williams
comment: Works well, a little input lag but to be expected when using a remote. Nice that it works with smartwatch(moto 360 2(2015)) but please add a little more functionality too the smart watch side though(mouse/keyboard/custom buttons) really fun being able to control presentation/media from watch, will definitely use next time I'm presenting something

author: Ishaq Iqbal
comment: You wont actually regret paying about $4 on this thing. I know that I could have the apk for free on xda or somewhere. But come on, whats the joy in that. You gotta give credit to the dev as well. Performance wise, does everything as told and expected. It could have been awesome if it could utilize higher network speed to remove the glitches and make the display view more fluid, robust and efficient. Thanks for the awesome utility program.

author: Deur K.
comment: 1.you could send more commands p/sec (getting rid of the lag) 2. It had a custom shortcut/command option, making it able to launch apps (firefox,media player,games, etc),with some respective subcommands ( shortcuts to facebook,youtube,etc / diffrent files in difrent drives,etc) 3. Devote time to every comand, like, trying to use youtube has been the single worst experience I have had so far, if you would again use some shortcuts like play,pause, etc and do this for every application this app would actually
title: Would be the best app ever if :

author: Asaad Solomon
comment: Happy with the app, but the remote desktop could use a full screen button for lazy people who don't want to turn on their screen rotation. Do that and you get 5 stars
title: Good app, does what's advertised.

author: ashkan hosseini
comment: Overall it's a great app and so far the best. User interface is beautiful. I would have given it a 5 if media mode worked with players other than Windows media player e.g VLC , and if I could turn the volume up/down by pressing the volume keys while the phone is locked.
title: Best remote app

author: Nick Thorpey
comment: Overall I love this app. Sometimes I find it lagging, can be difficult to truly control what's happening on the pc. I think aside from access to tool bar moving around the pc screen should behave like touch screen, scroll bars not needed.
title: General

author: Constance Keller
comment: You actually rated an app that you love, LOW because your opinion is people are lazy if they use it?  Wow!  You must have a lot of friends and success not only rating companies based on those who use it wrong, but your insane view of consumers.  May as well say people are lazy for buying toilet paper.  Your rating is void, and quite possibly slanderous.  Um.  I'm downloading it to just use for my pc.  I wasn't going to but hell, I mean I want to be as displeasing to anal retentive crazy people as I can.
title: Assad

author: Harry Moore
comment: Phone app is fantastic;regardless of the live screen lag. However I feel that there should be more features for the android wear such as the mouse
title: Needs more android wear support

author: Steven Elliott
comment: As a tracking pad this app works well and is the best of all I've tried. The extra, paid for, features are OK, as far as they go, but could be so much better. The media controls, for instance, are very limited. How much better if there was a way to define button functions for particular media players as is offered by apps like terRemote.
title: Getting there

author: Inter spark
comment: Does what it says on the tin. The perfect lazy man's app that lets you lounge on the couch while controlling your TV-connected computer.
title: Perfect

author: Jaylen Yancy
comment: The mouse is a little slow and so is the live screen. But other than that this app is great! Keep it up!😊😊
title: Love it but....

author: Christian A. Guerra
comment: I'm confused, what's the difference, all I know is that the blue version is further than the red?
title: Blue vs. Red difference

comment: Theis still hasn't beem fixed if im trying to watch something onit because i didnt wanna keep awitching channles i use this app ehat im watching a video of youtube the video it self freezes can you fix it please

comment: I bought this app couple years ago and have always found it very good, but I would love to have my sleep button back., even better would be sleep timer.

comment: No lag if you lag its your hardware on either end i experience zero lag

author: Jeffro Jacobs
comment: I like this app, and purchased the Full Version, and am disappointed that you can't turn Off "Taps" on the MousePad. If there was a setting to turn off the Left-Click Tap on the Mouse this would be a much better app and easier to use.  It doesn't matter if your just using the mouse, or using the mouse on the phone screen, it's very hard to navigate without accidently Tapping the pad and opening/closing a Doc or App.  Please fix this and it'll be a much better and easier to use app!! Thanks,
title: Fix the Mouse!!
